refsect2.title: scp_id
refsect2.para:
int
the BPEL process identifier to be compiled

refsect2.title: vdir
refsect2.para:
varchar
virtual directory to be created for this process (absolute path)

refsect2.title: opts
refsect2.para:
any
options to the virtual directory if specified

refsect2.title: no_check
refsect2.para:
int
flag to check or not partner links, bu default before compilation function will check if every partner link have corresponding WSDL uploaded

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: this function has no return value

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
BPEL.BPEL.compile_script
is used to compile BPEL script identified by scp_id and link to it all WSDL definitions have been associated to it.
